nodes.text: Menerus was a male Mirialan who served as a lieutenant in the Republic Army during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire, when he was stationed aboard the Dorin's Sky, a Thranta-class corvette in the Republic Navy. When the Dorin's Sky was boarded by the Sith, Menerus was killed defending the ship.
Lieutenant Menerus appears as one of the bosses in the Boarding Party Flashpoint appearing in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
